desc: Overnight: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 6 mph.
Wednesday: A 40 percent chance of showers after 11am.  Increasing clouds, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 5 to 11 mph.  New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Thursday: Partly sunny, with a high near 66. West southwest wind 8 to 11 mph.
Thursday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind 8 to 11 mph.
Friday: Mostly sunny, with a high near 71.
Friday Night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52.
Saturday: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 70.
Saturday Night: Showers likely, mainly after 11pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56.
